parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the application. Default value: **app-1000000**. For more information, see [Multi-application service](~~113600~~).

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description:
The name of the template.

*   The name cannot exceed 128 bytes.
*   The value must be encoded in UTF-8.

parameters.name: TemplateConfig
parameters.description: The configurations of the snapshot template. The value must be a JSON string. For more information about the data structure, see [SnapshotTemplateConfig](~~98618~~) and [DynamicImageTemplateConfig](~~98618~~).

parameters.name: TemplateType
parameters.description: The type of the template. Set the value to **Snapshot**.
